title: Help! cookies and chocolate milkshakes for those who help!
body:
Hey Rito,

Since 6.22 my game's been way more laggy - on speed tests everything looks fine; downloading or watching youtube is fine, but my ping in game is regularly shooting from 30-40ms up to 200-300ms.  I've run speed tests simultaneously but they show minimal fluctuations.  Rang my ISP and they said the modem and the game are probably having software compatibility issues...

I don't know what the problem is, but I'm hoping you can help me out with an explanation :)
My modem has the latest firmware, all was working quite well before 6.22

Thanks

replies.body:
short answer, nothing you can do. its not a ISP problem, its a problem connecting to the game server location.

if everything was running fine before 6.22 and nothing has changed since then, then by process of elimination is a LoL issue (most times)

some ISP connection slows down depend on the time of day or users on it, some ISP throttle there speed on certian unlimited plans.
anyone else in the house using the net at the same time? downloading etc etc

try flushing out your settings most times will fix 90% of problems with internet things

Select Command Prompt (Run as Administrator).
Type ipconfig /release in the command prompt.
Wait a few seconds for a reply that the IP address has been released.
Type ipconfig /renew in the command prompt.
Wait a few seconds for a reply that the IP address has been re-established.
Type ipconfig /flushdns in the command prompt.
